author: Katie Canales
title: A person at a San Francisco shelter is the first homeless resident in the city confirmed to have been infected with the coronavirus disease
description: A resident at a San Francisco homeless shelter is the first to be confirmed positive for COVID-19, the coronavirus disease, in the city. The resident was taken to a hotel room for self-isolation. Officials are now attempting to prevent a potential outbreak wi…
content:
A resident at a San Francisco homeless shelter has tested positive for the coronavirus disease, known as COVID-19.
It's the first confirmed case of the disease in a San Francisco homeless shelter, as the San Francisco Chronicle reports. The individual was li… [+1850 chars]
